author: odoo
comments: indian accounting  chart account                                        indian accounting chart localization   odoo allows manage indian accounting providing two formats of chart accounts e indian chart of accounts   standard indian chart of accounts   schedule vi   note  the schedule vi revised mca applicable balance sheet made 31st march  2011  the format done away earlier two options format balance sheet  vertical format permitted which supported by odoo               coding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# Part of Odoo. See LICENSE file for full copyright and licensing details.

{
    'name': 'Indian - Accounting',
    'version': '2.0',
    'description': """
Indian Accounting: Chart of Account.
====================================

Indian accounting chart and localization.

Odoo allows to manage Indian Accounting by providing Two Formats Of Chart of Accounts i.e Indian Chart Of Accounts - Standard and Indian Chart Of Accounts - Schedule VI.

Note: The Schedule VI has been revised by MCA and is applicable for all Balance Sheet made after
31st March, 2011. The Format has done away with earlier two options of format of Balance
Sheet, now only Vertical format has been permitted Which is Supported By Odoo.
  """,
    'category': 'Localization',
    'depends': [
        'account_tax_python',
    ],
    'data': [
        'data/account_data.xml',
        'data/l10n_in_chart_data.xml',
        'data/account_tax_template_data.xml',
        'data/account_fiscal_position_data.xml',
        'data/res_country_state_data.xml',
        'data/account_chart_template_data.yml',
        'views/product_template_view.xml',
        'views/report_invoice.xml',
        'views/res_company_view.xml',
        'views/res_country_state_view.xml',
        'views/res_partner_views.xml',
    ],
}
description: Odoo. Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.
